news_items.content: Here is a rewritten version of the text:

Tamil Nadu: PM Modi hails Chola legacy as new statue plan unveiled in Chennai. Renovated wetland aviary and nocturnal house at Vandalur zoo open; nearly â‚¹100 crore revenue to be generated from ads on corporation website.
Chennai News Today brings you latest updates on local and national news, weather, education, sports, crime, entertainment, real estate, and more.
Tamil Nadu fishermen return home after successful rescue mission in Iran. Meanwhile, three Chennai college students drowned in the Coimbatore river.
The court found Balaji guilty of multiple charges and sentenced him to 20 years in jail for a serious offense. A man was arrested in Chennai for raping a 7-year-old child.
India faces an electric current-induced stampede at UP's temple in Barabanki, leaving several dead and many injured. The situation is being closely monitored.
Varma controversy erupts as the Congress party questions the legitimacy of an RS notice. PM Modi defends the government's actions, calling it a "petty mindset".
Stalin sends a missive to PM Modi, highlighting education fund issues and proposed metro rail projects in Sri Lanka. NASA's ISRO satellite launch and Gaganyaan updates have been made public.

SoftBank CEO SoftBank's vision for an AI future is being debated, with some experts calling for the development of Artificial Intelligence (AI). Salesforce has acquired Informatica to strengthen its artificial intelligence offerings.
Artificial intelligence is making waves in various industries, including Nvidia, AMD, and Google. A new organization proposes a global cooperation on AI development.

China's Premier Li aims to establish a global AI cooperation framework. The US plans to relax rules for AI to speed up the AI race. The Trump administration has taken steps to promote AI safety and transparency.
Companies like Meta and OpenAI are investing heavily in artificial intelligence research. A new robot designed by AI researchers is being developed to monitor air quality.
A giant AI-powered Sphere screen was unveiled for a film adaptation of "The Wizard of Oz". DOGE, an AI-powered virtual reality platform, has been used to slash federal regulations.
Trump's executive orders targeting "woke" AI models and regulation have been met with mixed reactions. Google tops expectations in terms of revenue after investing heavily in artificial intelligence.
